author: Boston Herald editorial staff
title: Trump, Carson top new Franklin Pierce-Herald poll | Herald Bulldog | First On The Street
text:
Herald Radio's "Morning Meeting" show has the exclusive poll results for the Republican race for president that show Donald Trump atop the field with 28 percent of the vote with Dr. Ben Carson next with 16 percent.
Listen to all the numbers live on Herald Radio right now ...
LISTEN HERE ...
Developing ...
